hints.content:
$\green{90}$ trees is the same as $\green{9\text{ groups of ten}}$ trees.

There are $\red5$ parks.

Total number of trees:  
$\begin{align}&\red5\times\green{9\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{45\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{450}\end{align}$

question.content:
A volunteer group is planting trees at $5$ different parks. They planted $90$ trees at each park.

**How many trees did the group plant in all?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] trees
